name: Sisters In Hotel: Episode 2
description:
After Kaoru realized that the most important thing he has is sisters, they decide to move to their old house in which they grew up ...
Will old memories return harmony back to the family?

“Sisters in hotel” is a drama Visual Novel featuring:

- A deep and heartbreaking storyline that touches many interesting themes and topics
- Brilliant art style, backgrounds and sprites
- Awesome background music
- 4800 Steam Achievements
